sentences.en: "I think we've made a crucial step towards finding if there is life out there, " said Amaury Triaud, one of the study authors and an astronomer at the University of Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 该项研究作者之一、剑桥大学天文学家阿莫里·特里奥表示说：“我认为我们在发现是否存在地外生命方面走出了至关重要的一步。

sentences.en: A new star attracted the notice of the astronomer.
sentences.cn: 新发现的一颗星引起了那位天文学家的注意.

sentences.en: A prominet Soviet astronomer puts it well.
sentences.cn: 一位著名的苏联天文学家对此有过十分精辟的描绘.

sentences.en: According to a Cornell astronomer, it's just rock formation.
sentences.cn: 据天文学家称, 那只是一块岩石.

sentences.en: An astronomer can determine the brightness of each star.
sentences.cn: 天文学家能够测定每颗恒星的亮度。

sentences.en: Any astronomer, at any university, in any country can write a proposal for what they want to do with the telescope.
sentences.cn: 任何国家、任何大学的天文学家都可以递交申请，告诉我们他们想要使用这台望远镜做什么。

sentences.en: If people know you’re an astronomer, they will soon be asking you all about it.
sentences.cn: 如果有人知道你是个天文学家，他们会很快向你询问关于这件事的一切。

sentences.en: It is the only tangible object the astronomer can handle.
sentences.cn: 这是天文学家能够掌握的唯一可接触的对象.

sentences.en: Leon Stuart reported what he saw to the publication The Strolling Astronomer.
sentences.cn: 利昂?斯图亚特向《漫步着的天文学家》杂志报告了他所看到的现象.

sentences.en: Make much mathematician, physicist, astronomer wait to be enrolled to enter Microsoft.
sentences.cn: 许多数学家 、 物理学家 、 天文学家等被招进微软.

sentences.en: My ideal is to be an astronomer.
sentences.cn: 我的理想是当一个天文学家。

sentences.en: One astronomer looked at pictures of Miranda and remembered an old joke.
sentences.cn: 一位天文学家看着天王星的照片想起了一句过去开过的玩笑.

sentences.en: The amateur astronomer must consult the exposure meter and not rely on his senses.
sentences.cn: 业余天文学家必须参照曝光表而不能光靠感觉.

sentences.en: The amateur astronomer will be well able to fulfill these.
sentences.cn: 业余天文学家是可能做到这些的.

sentences.en: The astronomer arranged in a series his observation on the stars.
sentences.cn: 这位天文学家将他对星星的观察所得按次序编列.

sentences.en: The astronomer look at the starry sky, trying to locate centaur.
sentences.cn: 这位天文学家看着满天星斗的天空, 试着找到半人马星座.

sentences.en: The astronomer must decipher it before being able to assess its significance.
sentences.cn: 天文学家必须在对它的意义作出评价之前,先把它翻译出来.

sentences.en: The astronomer presented a new concept of the beginning of the universe.
sentences.cn: 这位天文学家提出了一个宇宙起源的新概念。

sentences.en: Then one day an astronomer came to the village.
sentences.cn: 终有一日，村子里来了一个天文学家。

sentences.en: There was no gainsaying the astronomer's knowledge about the planets.
sentences.cn: 这位天文学家对于行星的知识是毋庸置疑的.

sentences.en: This assistant is alive today and an astronomer, of course.
sentences.cn: 这助手今天还活着而且是个天文学家, 当然.
